itunes:title: #FBF: Market Yourself in 3 Steps
title: #FBF: Market Yourself in 3 Steps
description:
Emily is joined by expert marketer and author of Market Your Genius, Nikki Nash to discuss why packaging, promoting and delivering are all critical phases to market your business. They also touch on when it is important to check out what your competitors are doing. If you want to hear more of this conversation, check out Episode 256 Market Your Genius with Nikki Nash >> https://beingboss.club/podcast/market-your-genius

—

Listen to more Being Boss shows on our website, on Apple Podcasts, or wherever you listen to podcasts.

Follow Being Boss on Instagram: @beingbossclub
